Name: The Argyll
Ingredients: 60 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Southern Comfort lovers only need apply.
Nutrition: One serving of The Argyll contains 196 calories
